Class CarConfigurator

extends Object

    1.0 UI class, that lets you configure a car in the console

      • input

        private int input​(String message,
                  List list)
        Helper method for the input. Does only return the number if a number between 1 and list.size() gets chosen
        Parameters:
        message - The message that gets displayed before the input
        list - The list
        Returns:
        A number for the input. Can't be smaller than 1 or bigger than list.size()
